CustomField.description: Sales will populate this field during the sales cycle with initial ideas around the Billing Partner for a deal. Once a deal goes into contracting, the official Billing Partner is established as a relationship in the Relationship table.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sales will populate this field during the sales cycle with initial ideas around the Billing Partner for a deal. Once a deal goes into contracting, the official Billing Partner is established as a relationship in the Relationship table.
CustomField.label: Pre-Contracting Billing Partner
